summary: When a temple priest commits suicide after being dishonored by an evil landlord, his son returns to his native village on a mission of vengeance.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Tamannaah Bhatia|Paresh Rawal|Mahesh Manjrekar|Zarina Wahab|Adhyayan Suman|Leena Jumani|Asrani|Anil Dhawan|Rajendra Gupta|Vindu Dara Singh|Chunky Pandey|Roy Bronsgeest|Surveen Chawla|Riteish Deshmukh|Rinku Ghosh|Amruta Khanvilkar|Sonakshi Sinha|Dheer Charan Srivastav|Mona Thiba
title: Himmatwala
